languages.text: Проведя вахту в медитативном размышлении, Кибелла приняла решение. В парадном облачении она явилась на мостик и поднесла Домин стальной ларец, перетянутый цепью. Цепь та была скована из сломанных клинков, принадлежавших Кибелле, а в ларце лежала колода Таро Императора. Отвергнув волю Неумирающего, Кибелла отвергла и святыню Его, и более никогда не касалась Его карт.
languages.translation_comment:
Романс закончен на хаос
ИЛИ Квест закончен на хаос

Романс закончен на хаос
ИЛИ Квест закончен на хаос

languages.text: After spending the watch in reflection and meditation, Kibellah made up her mind. She came up on the bridge in ceremonial dress and presented the Domin with a steel chest fastened by a chain. The chain was made of broken blades that had belonged to Kibellah, and the chest contained the Emperor's Tarot deck. As part of rejecting the Undying One's will, Kibellah also disowned His relic, and never touched His cards again.
languages.original_text: Проведя вахту в медитативном размышлении, Кибелла приняла решение. В парадном облачении она явилась на мостик и поднесла Домин стальной ларец, перетянутый цепью. Цепь та была скована из сломанных клинков, принадлежавших Кибелле, а в ларце лежала колода Таро Императора. Отвергнув волю Неумирающего, Кибелла отвергла и святыню Его, и более никогда не касалась Его карт.

traits.locale_text: After a watch-long reflection and meditation, Kibellah made up her mind. She came up on the bridge in parade dress and presented the Domin with a steel chest fastened by a chain. The chain was made of broken blades that had belonged to Kibellah, and the chest contained the Emperor's Tarot deck. As part of rejecting the Undying One's will, Kibellah also disowned His relic, and never touched His cards again.

languages.text: Nachdem sie während ihrer Schicht reflektiert und meditiert hatte, traf Kibellah eine Entscheidung. Sie kam in zeremoniellen Gewändern auf die Brücke und präsentierte {mf|dem|der} Domin eine stählerne Truhe an einer Kette. Die Kette bestand aus geborstenen Klingen, die Kibellah gehörten. Die Kiste enthielt das Tarot des Imperators. Im Zuge ihrer Abkehr vom Willen des Todlosen trennte sich Kibellah auch von Seiner Reliquie und fasste Seine Karte nie wieder an.
languages.original_text: After spending the watch in reflection and meditation, Kibellah made up her mind. She came up on the bridge in ceremonial dress and presented the Domin with a steel chest fastened by a chain. The chain was made of broken blades that had belonged to Kibellah, and the chest contained the Emperor's Tarot deck. As part of rejecting the Undying One's will, Kibellah also disowned His relic, and never touched His cards again.

traits.locale_text: Nachdem sie während ihrer Schicht reflektiert und meditiert hatte, traf Kibellah eine Entscheidung. Sie kam in zeremoniellen Gewändern auf die Brücke und präsentierte {mf|dem|der} Domin eine stählerne Truhe an einer Kette. Die Kette bestand aus geborstenen Klingen, die Kibellah gehörten. Die Kiste enthielt das Tarot des Imperators. Im Zuge ihrer Abkehr vom Willen des Todlosen trennte sich Kibellah auch von Seiner Reliquie und fasste Seine Karte nie wieder an.

languages.text: Après un long quart passé à réfléchir et à méditer, Kibellah finit par prendre sa décision. Elle se présenta sur la passerelle vêtue d'une robe cérémonielle et offrit {mf|au|à la} Domin un coffre d'acier fermé par une chaîne composée de lames brisées lui ayant appartenu. Un coffre qui renfermait le tarot sacré de l'Empereur. En rejetant la volonté de l'Immortel, Kibellah avait aussi renoncé à Sa relique, et elle ne toucha plus jamais Ses arcanes.
languages.original_text: After spending the watch in reflection and meditation, Kibellah made up her mind. She came up on the bridge in ceremonial dress and presented the Domin with a steel chest fastened by a chain. The chain was made of broken blades that had belonged to Kibellah, and the chest contained the Emperor's Tarot deck. As part of rejecting the Undying One's will, Kibellah also disowned His relic, and never touched His cards again.

traits.locale_text: Après un long quart passé à réfléchir et à méditer, Kibellah finit par prendre sa décision. Elle se présenta sur la passerelle vêtue d'une robe cérémonielle et offrit {mf|au|à la} Domin un coffre d'acier fermé par une chaîne composée de lames brisées lui ayant appartenu. Un coffre qui renfermait le tarot sacré de l'Empereur. En rejetant la volonté de l'Immortel, Kibellah avait aussi renoncé à Sa relique, et elle ne toucha plus jamais Ses arcanes.

languages.text: Tras pasar la guardia entera reflexionando y meditando, Kibellah tomó una decisión. Subió al puente en atuendo ceremonial y entregó a su Domin un cofre de acero sujeto por una cadena. La cadena estaba formada por los restos de las espadas rotas de Kibellah, mientras que el cofre encerraba el Tarot del Emperador. Al rechazar la voluntad del Inmortal, Kibellah también renunció a Su reliquia, negándose a volver a tocar jamás las cartas.
languages.original_text: After spending the watch in reflection and meditation, Kibellah made up her mind. She came up on the bridge in ceremonial dress and presented the Domin with a steel chest fastened by a chain. The chain was made of broken blades that had belonged to Kibellah, and the chest contained the Emperor's Tarot deck. As part of rejecting the Undying One's will, Kibellah also disowned His relic, and never touched His cards again.

traits.locale_text: Tras pasar la guardia entera reflexionando y meditando, Kibellah tomó una decisión. Subió al puente en atuendo ceremonial y entregó a su Domin un cofre de acero sujeto por una cadena. La cadena estaba formada por los restos de las espadas rotas de Kibellah, mientras que el cofre encerraba el Tarot del Emperador. Al rechazar la voluntad del Inmortal, Kibellah también renunció a Su reliquia, negándose a volver a tocar jamás las cartas.

languages.text: そのウォッチを内省と瞑想に費やしたのち、キベラは結審した。礼服でブリッジに上がり、鎖で鵜流れた鋼の箱をドミンに贈った。鎖はキベラのものであった折れた刃でできており、箱には皇帝陛下の占い札のデッキが入っていた。不死の者の意思を拒絶する一環としてキベラはその聖遺物とも決別し、彼女がそのカードに触れることは二度となかった。
languages.original_text: After spending the watch in reflection and meditation, Kibellah made up her mind. She came up on the bridge in ceremonial dress and presented the Domin with a steel chest fastened by a chain. The chain was made of broken blades that had belonged to Kibellah, and the chest contained the Emperor's Tarot deck. As part of rejecting the Undying One's will, Kibellah also disowned His relic, and never touched His cards again.

traits.locale_text: そのウォッチを内省と瞑想に費やしたのち、キベラは結審した。礼服でブリッジに上がり、鎖で鵜流れた鋼の箱をドミンに贈った。鎖はキベラのものであった折れた刃でできており、箱には皇帝陛下の占い札のデッキが入っていた。不死の者の意思を拒絶する一環としてキベラはその聖遺物とも決別し、彼女がそのカードに触れることは二度となかった。

languages.text: 绮贝菈花了整整一巡的时间进行反思、冥想，最终下定了决心。她穿着华丽的礼服走上舰桥，将一个用锁链捆好的塑钢箱子交给了秘者。锁链是用绮贝菈破碎的利刃铸成的，箱子里装着帝皇的塔罗牌。绮贝菈拒绝了不死之神的一部分意志，也舍弃了祂的圣物，再也没有碰过这些牌。
languages.original_text: After spending the watch in reflection and meditation, Kibellah made up her mind. She came up on the bridge in ceremonial dress and presented the Domin with a steel chest fastened by a chain. The chain was made of broken blades that had belonged to Kibellah, and the chest contained the Emperor's Tarot deck. As part of rejecting the Undying One's will, Kibellah also disowned His relic, and never touched His cards again.

traits.locale_text: 绮贝菈花了整整一巡的时间进行反思、冥想，最终下定了决心。她穿着华丽的礼服走上舰桥，将一个用锁链捆好的塑钢箱子交给了秘者。锁链是用绮贝菈破碎的利刃铸成的，箱子里装着帝皇的塔罗牌。绮贝菈拒绝了不死之神的一部分意志，也舍弃了祂的圣物，再也没有碰过这些牌。

languages.text: Vaktini derin düşüncelere dalıp meditasyon yaparak geçiren Kibellah kararını verdi. Tören kıyafetlerini kuşanarak köprüye geldi ve Domin'e zincirle çevrilmiş metal bir sandık takdim etti. Zincir, bir vakitler Kibellah'ya ait olan kırık kılıçlardan yapılmıştı. Sandığın içerisinde ise İmparator'un Tarotu destesi duruyordu. Kibellah, Ölmeyen'in arzusunu reddetmenin bir parçası olarak O'nun yadigârını da reddederek kartlarına bir daha asla dokunmadı.
languages.original_text: After spending the watch in reflection and meditation, Kibellah made up her mind. She came up on the bridge in ceremonial dress and presented the Domin with a steel chest fastened by a chain. The chain was made of broken blades that had belonged to Kibellah, and the chest contained the Emperor's Tarot deck. As part of rejecting the Undying One's will, Kibellah also disowned His relic, and never touched His cards again.
